page.title: 05INDUSTRY 2.
page.content: Of the original industries only one Brickworks remains. This has had complete new plant installed though the clay is now brought by road from a site a few miles away. Of the new industries the small firms seem to be thriving and increasing in number. The principal ones i.e.longest surviving, are in light engineering and welding - making specific parts for the Aero industry, mining and welding equipment; others specialise in contract work. Other factories are as varied as their numbers making: Choc Ices, Cans, Pizzas, Cardboard Boxes, Cosmetics, Greetings Cards, Plastic Containers, Disposable cups, Crisps, Varnish, Cleaning Materials, Cement, Packaging The majority of employees are women working days and nights, very often on a part-time basis
